title: "DeletingPods - With no errors" takes a long time

content.raw:
Hello,

last night I tried new AWS images \(2019-12-20\), started two simulations of two robots \(first one was by accident that I did not notice that my docker image took much longer time to upload, so the second run was “just for sure” when the image was already available\). In both cases I tried “robotika configuration”. Now \(11 hours after?\) it is still in “DeletingPods” stage - is it expected? I am posting it here if other competitors have similar issue? Maybe it is expected and instead of 5 minutes the robot was stuck for the whole simulation hour??

robotika, ver34p1b, ba1c031c-7f02-42e3-b47c-cf5e0b405e02, urban practice 1

p.s. also thanks for “info button” for older simulations - it helps :slight_smile:
content.html:
Hello,

last night I tried new AWS images (2019-12-20), started two simulations of two robots (first one was by accident that I did not notice that my docker image took much longer time to upload, so the second run was “just for sure” when the image was already available). In both cases I tried “robotika configuration”. Now (11 hours after?) it is still in “DeletingPods” stage - is it expected? I am posting it here if other competitors have similar issue? Maybe it is expected and instead of 5 minutes the robot was stuck for the whole simulation hour??

robotika, ver34p1b, ba1c031c-7f02-42e3-b47c-cf5e0b405e02, urban practice 1

p.s. also thanks for “info button” for older simulations - it helps
